channel.title: DreamWorks on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in DreamWorks on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Shrek’ Donkey Spinoff Movie Firmly Happening, Eddie Murphy Says
item.description: Murphy says a film based around the fan-favorite character and his donkey family will begin recording dialogue in September, though DreamWorks hasn’t confirmed the project.

item.title: ‘Shrek’ Donkey Spinoff Movie Firmly Happening, Eddie Murphy Says
item.description: Murphy says a film based around the fan-favorite character and his donkey family will begin recording dialogue in September, though DreamWorks hasn’t confirmed the project.

item.title: DreamWorks Commissary Workers Strike Amid Union Contract Negotiations
item.description: Dishwashers, cooks and cashiers are withholding their labor while claiming that their employer, Bon Appetit Management Company, has “failed to come to a fair agreement” with their union.

item.title: Drugs, Paid Sex and No Prenup: David Geffen’s Divorce Drama Goes Public as Mogul’s Ex Files Explosive Lawsuit
item.description: The mysterious marriage and subsequent split between David Geffen and model Donovan Michaels has spilled out into the public domain. And it’s getting nasty. On Tuesday morning, Michaels, aka Donovan A
